section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 75-353, Piper and Others against Chris-Craft Industries, and the related cases First Boston Corporation against Chris-Craft Industries, and Bangor Hunter against Chris Craft Industries for reasons stated and an opinion of the Court filed with the Clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit is reversed terminating 10 years of complex litigation.
Mr. Justice Blackmun filed an opinion concurring in the judgment.
Mr. Justice Stevens with whom Mr. Justice Brennan joined and filed a dissenting opinion.
